let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
let rec acc xs = 
match xs with 
| (k', v') :: tl -> if k' = k then v' else acc tl
| [] -> d
| _ -> failwith "to be written"
in
acc l

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
let rec acc xs = 
match xs with 
| (k', v') :: tl -> 
if k' = k then 
v' else 
acc tl
| [] -> d
| _ -> failwith "This ain't your mom's hashmap"
in
acc l

let removeDuplicates l = 
let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
match rest with 
[] -> seen
| h::t -> 
let seen' = 
if List.mem h seen 
then h :: seen 
else seen  
in
let rest' = t in 
helper (seen',rest') 
in
List.rev (helper ([],l))

let removeDuplicates l = 
let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
match rest with 
[] -> seen
| h::t -> 
let seen' = 
if List.mem h seen then h :: seen else seen  in
let rest' = t in 
helper (seen',rest') 
in
List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) =
let rec acc result =
let res = (f b) in
match res with
(b', c') -> if c' then acc b' else b'
in
acc b

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e' -> sin (pi * (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Cosine e' -> cos (pi * (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | _ -> failwith "we are seriously writing a lisp compiler god save us all";;

assoc d k tl
| [] -> d

let rec wwhile (f,b) =
let res = (f b) in
match res with
(b', c') -> if c' then wwhile (f, b') else b'

let rec exprToString e = 
match e with 
| VarX -> "x"
| VarY -> "y"
| Sine(e') -> Printf.sprintf "sin(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
| Cosine(e') -> Printf.sprintf "cos(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
| Average(e1, e2) -> Printf.sprintf "((%s+%s)/2)" 
(exprToString e1) 
(exprToString e2)
| Times (e1, e2) -> Printf.sprintf "%s*%s"
(exprToString e1)
(exprToString e2)
| Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> Printf.sprintf "(%s<%s?%s:%s)"
(exprToString e1)
(exprToString e2)
(exprToString e3)
(exprToString e4)
| Sqrt (e) -> Printf.sprintf "(|%s|)^0.5"
(exprToString (Abs(e)))
| Abs (e) -> Printf.sprintf "|%s|" 
(exprToString e)
| _ -> failwith "are we writing a lisp compiler now"

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e' -> sin (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Cosine e' -> cos (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Sqrt e -> sqrt (abs_float (eval (e, x, y)))
  | _ -> failwith "we are seriously writing a lisp compiler god save us all";;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

let rec build (rand,depth) = match depth with | 0 -> 0;;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e' -> Printf.sprintf "sin(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Cosine e' -> Printf.sprintf "cos(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "((%s+%s)/2)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "%s*%s" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      Printf.sprintf "(%s<%s?%s:%s)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
        (exprToString e3) (exprToString e4)
  | Sqrt e -> Printf.sprintf "(%s)^0.5" (exprToString (Abs e))
  | Abs e -> Printf.sprintf "|%s|" (exprToString e)
  | _ -> failwith "are we writing a lisp compiler now";;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in
  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitColor (f1, f2, f3, n, name);;

| (k', v') :: tl ->

assoc (d, k, tl)
| [] -> d

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  match depth with
  | 0 -> VarX
  | _ ->
      let next = build (rand, (depth - 1)) in
      (match rand (1, 7) with
       | 1 -> buildSine next
       | 2 -> buildCosine next
       | 3 -> buildAverage (next, next)
       | 4 -> buildTimes (next, next)
       | 5 -> buildThresh (next, next, next, next)
       | 6 -> buildSqrt next
       | 7 -> buildGauss (next, next, next));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e' -> Printf.sprintf "sin(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Cosine e' -> Printf.sprintf "cos(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "((%s+%s)/2)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "%s*%s" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      Printf.sprintf "(%s<%s?%s:%s)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
        (exprToString e3) (exprToString e4)
  | Sqrt e -> Printf.sprintf "(%s)^0.5" (exprToString (Abs e))
  | Abs e -> Printf.sprintf "|%s|" (exprToString e)
  | Gauss (e1,e2,e3) ->
      Printf.sprintf "2*(e^(%s-%s)^2/%s) - 1" (exprToString e1)
        (exprToString e2) (exprToString e3)
  | _ -> failwith "are we writing a lisp compiler now";;

  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in

  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
match e with 
| VarX -> x
| VarY -> y
| Sine(e') -> sin(pi*.eval(e', x, y))
| Cosine(e') -> cos(pi*.eval(e', x, y))
| Average(e1, e2) -> (eval(e1, x, y) +. eval(e2, x, y))/.2.0
| Times (e1, e2) -> (eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x, y))
| Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> 
if eval(e1, x, y) < eval (e2, x, y)
then eval(e3, x, y)
else eval(e4, x, y)
| Sqrt (e) -> sqrt (abs_float (eval (e, x, y)))
| Gauss (e1, e2, e3) -> 
2.0 *.exp (
(eval (e1, x, y) -. 
eval (e2, x, y))** 2.0 
/. eval (e3, x,y)) 
-. 1.0

| _ -> failwith Printf.sprintf "Expression %s" e

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Sqrt of expr
  | Abs of expr
  | Gauss of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildGauss (e1,e2,e3) = Gauss (e1, e2, e3);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildSqrt e = Sqrt e;;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  match depth with
  | 0 -> (match rand (1, 2) with | 1 -> VarX | 2 -> VarY)
  | _ ->
      let next = build (rand, (depth - 1)) in
      (match rand (1, 7) with
       | 1 -> buildSine next
       | 2 -> buildCosine next
       | 3 ->
           buildAverage
             ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 4 -> buildTimes (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 5 ->
           buildThresh
             (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
               (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 6 -> buildSqrt next
       | 7 ->
           buildGauss
             (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e' -> Printf.sprintf "sin(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Cosine e' -> Printf.sprintf "cos(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "((%s+%s)/2)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "%s*%s" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      Printf.sprintf "(%s<%s?%s:%s)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)

  | Sqrt e -> Printf.sprintf "(%s)^0.5" (exprToString (Abs e))
  | Abs e -> Printf.sprintf "|%s|" (exprToString e)
  | Gauss (e1,e2,e3) ->
      Printf.sprintf "2*(e^(%s-%s)^2/%s) - 1" (exprToString e1)
        (exprToString e2) (exprToString e3)
  | _ -> failwith "are we writing a lisp compiler now";;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
(* Initialize random-number generator g *)
let g = makeRand(seed1,seed2) in
(* Generate a random expression, and turn it into an ML function *)
let e = build (g,depth) in
let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
let f = eval_fn e in
(* 301 x 301 pixels *)
let n = 150 in
(* Emit the picture *)
let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
emitGrayscale (f,n,name)
ocaml.min:
let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e' -> sin (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Cosine e' -> cos (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Sqrt e -> sqrt (abs_float (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Gauss (e1,e2,e3) ->
      (2.0 *.
         (exp
            ((((eval (e1, x, y)) -. (eval (e2, x, y))) ** 2.0) /.
               (eval (e3, x, y)))))
        -. 1.0
  | _ -> failwith "error";;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Sqrt of expr
  | Abs of expr
  | Gauss of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildGauss (e1,e2,e3) = Gauss (e1, e2, e3);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildSqrt e = Sqrt e;;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  match depth with
  | 0 -> (match rand (1, 3) with | 1 -> VarX | 2 -> VarY)
  | _ ->
      let next = build (rand, (depth - 1)) in
      (match rand (1, 8) with
       | 1 -> buildSine next
       | 2 -> buildCosine next
       | 3 ->
           buildAverage
             ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 4 -> buildTimes (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 5 ->
           buildThresh
             (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
               (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 6 -> buildSqrt next
       | 7 ->
           buildGauss
             (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e' -> Printf.sprintf "sin(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Cosine e' -> Printf.sprintf "cos(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "((%s+%s)/2)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "%s*%s" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      Printf.sprintf "(%s<%s?%s:%s)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
        (exprToString e3) (exprToString e4)
  | Sqrt e -> Printf.sprintf "(%s)^0.5" (exprToString (Abs e))
  | Abs e -> Printf.sprintf "|%s|" (exprToString e)
  | Gauss (e1,e2,e3) ->
      Printf.sprintf "2*(e^(%s-%s)^2/%s) - 1" (exprToString e1)
        (exprToString e2) (exprToString e3)
  | _ -> failwith "are we writing a lisp compiler now";;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
(* Initialize random-number generator g *)
let g = makeRand(seed1,seed2) in
(* Generate a random expression, and turn it into an ML function *)
let e = build (g,depth) in
let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
let f = eval_fn e in
(* 301 x 301 pixels *)
let n = 150 in
(* Emit the picture *)
let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e' -> sin (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Cosine e' -> cos (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Sqrt e -> sqrt (abs_float (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Gauss (e1,e2,e3) ->
      (2.0 *.
         (exp
            ((((eval (e1, x, y)) -. (eval (e2, x, y))) ** 2.0) /.
               (eval (e3, x, y)))))
        -. 1.0
  | _ -> failwith "error";;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Sqrt of expr
  | Abs of expr
  | Gauss of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAbs e = Abs e;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildGauss (e1,e2,e3) = Gauss (e1, e2, e3);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildSqrt e = Sqrt e;;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  match depth with
  | 0 -> (match rand (0, 2) with | 0 -> VarX | 1 -> VarY | _ -> VarY)
  | _ ->
      let next = build (rand, (depth - 1)) in
      (match rand (1, 8) with
       | 1 -> buildSine next
       | 2 -> buildCosine next
       | 3 ->
           buildAverage
             ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 4 -> buildTimes (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 5 ->
           buildThresh
             (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
               (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 6 -> buildSqrt next
       | 7 ->
           buildGauss
             (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | _ -> buildAbs next);;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e' -> Printf.sprintf "sin(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Cosine e' -> Printf.sprintf "cos(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "((%s+%s)/2)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "%s*%s" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      Printf.sprintf "(%s<%s?%s:%s)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
        (exprToString e3) (exprToString e4)
  | Sqrt e -> Printf.sprintf "(%s)^0.5" (exprToString (Abs e))
  | Abs e -> Printf.sprintf "|%s|" (exprToString e)
  | Gauss (e1,e2,e3) ->
      Printf.sprintf "2*(e^(%s-%s)^2/%s) - 1" (exprToString e1)
        (exprToString e2) (exprToString e3)
  | _ -> failwith "are we writing a lisp compiler now";;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Sqrt of expr
  | Abs of expr
  | Gauss of expr* expr* expr;;

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e' -> sin (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Cosine e' -> cos (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Sqrt e -> sqrt (abs_float (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Gauss (e1,e2,e3) ->
      (2.0 *.
         (exp
            (-
               ((((eval (e1, x, y)) -. (eval (e2, x, y))) ** 2.0) /.
                  (eval (e3, x, y))))))
        -. 1.0
  | _ -> failwith "error";;

let rec exprToString e = 
match e with 
| VarX -> "x"
| VarY -> "y"
| Sine(e') -> Printf.sprintf "sin(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
| Cosine(e') -> Printf.sprintf "cos(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
| Average(e1, e2) -> Printf.sprintf "((%s+%s)/2)" 
(exprToString e1) 
(exprToString e2)
| Times (e1, e2) -> Printf.sprintf "%s*%s"
(exprToString e1)
(exprToString e2)
| Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> Printf.sprintf "(%s<%s?%s:%s)"
(exprToString e1)
(exprToString e2)
(exprToString e3)
(exprToString e4)
| Sqrt (e) -> Printf.sprintf "(%s)^0.5"
(exprToString (Abs(e)))
| Abs (e) -> Printf.sprintf "|%s|" 
(exprToString e)
| Gauss (e1, e2, e3) -> Printf.sprintf "2*(e^(-((%s-%s)/%s)^2) - 1"
(exprToString e1)
(exprToString e2)
(exprToString e3)
| _ -> failwith "are we writing a lisp compiler now"

let rec exprToString e = 
match e with 
| VarX -> "x"
| VarY -> "y"
| Sine(e') -> Printf.sprintf "sin(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
| Cosine(e') -> Printf.sprintf "cos(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
| Average(e1, e2) -> Printf.sprintf "((%s+%s)/2)" 
(exprToString e1) 
(exprToString e2)
| Times (e1, e2) -> Printf.sprintf "%s*%s"
(exprToString e1)
(exprToString e2)
| Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> Printf.sprintf "(%s<%s?%s:%s)"
(exprToString e1)
(exprToString e2)
(exprToString e3)
(exprToString e4)
| Sqrt (e) -> Printf.sprintf "(%s)^0.5"
(exprToString (Abs(e)))
| Abs (e) -> Printf.sprintf "|%s|" 
(exprToString e)
| Logistic (e1, e2, e3) -> Printf.sprintf "(2/(1 - e^(-%s*%s*%s)) - 1)"
(exprToString e1)
(exprToString e2)
(exprToString e3)

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e' -> sin (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Cosine e' -> cos (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Sqrt e -> sqrt (abs_float (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Logistic (e1,e2,e3) ->
      2.0 /.
        ((1.0 -.

               (-.
                  (((eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))) *.
                     (eval (e3, x, y))))))
           -. 1.0)
  | _ -> failwith "error";;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e = 
match e with 
| VarX -> "x"
| VarY -> "y"
| Sine(e') -> Printf.sprintf "sin(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
| Cosine(e') -> Printf.sprintf "cos(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
| Average(e1, e2) -> Printf.sprintf "((%s+%s)/2)" 
(exprToString e1) 
(exprToString e2)
| Times (e1, e2) -> Printf.sprintf "%s*%s"
(exprToString e1)
(exprToString e2)
| Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> Printf.sprintf "(%s<%s?%s:%s)"
(exprToString e1)
(exprToString e2)
(exprToString e3)
(exprToString e4)
| Sqrt (e) -> Printf.sprintf "(%s)^0.5"
(exprToString (Abs(e)))
| Abs (e) -> Printf.sprintf "|%s|" 
(exprToString e)
| Logistic (e1, e2, e3) -> Printf.sprintf "(1/(1 - e^(-%s*%s*%s)))"
(exprToString e1)
(exprToString e2)
(exprToString e3)
| _ -> failwith "are we writing a lisp compiler now"

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
(* Initialize random-number generator g *)
let g = makeRand(seed1,seed2) in
(* Generate a random expression, and turn it into an ML function *)
let e = build (g,depth) in
let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
let f = eval_fn e in
(* 301 x 301 pixels *)
let n = 150 in
(* Emit the picture *)
let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

  match depth with
  | 0 -> (match rand (0, 1) with | 0 -> VarX | 1 -> VarY | _ -> VarY)
  | _ ->
      let next = build (rand, (depth - 1)) in
      (match rand (1, 6) with
       | 1 -> buildSine next
       | 2 -> buildCosine next
       | 3 ->
           buildAverage
             ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 4 -> buildTimes (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 5 ->
           buildThresh
             (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
               (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 6 -> buildSqrt next);;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e' -> Printf.sprintf "sin(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Cosine e' -> Printf.sprintf "cos(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "((%s+%s)/2)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "%s*%s" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      Printf.sprintf "(%s<%s?%s:%s)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
        (exprToString e3) (exprToString e4)
  | Sqrt e -> Printf.sprintf "(%s)^0.5" (exprToString (Abs e))
  | Abs e -> Printf.sprintf "|%s|" (exprToString e)
  | Logistic (e1,e2,e3) ->
      Printf.sprintf "(1/(1 - e^(-%s*%s*%s)))" (exprToString e1)
        (exprToString e2) (exprToString e3)
  | _ -> failwith "are we writing a lisp compiler now";;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e' -> sin (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Cosine e' -> cos (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e' -> sin (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Cosine e' -> cos (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Sqrt e -> sqrt (abs_float (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Logistic (e1,e2,e3) ->
      1.0 /.
        (1.0 -.
           (exp
              (-.
                 (((eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))) *.
                    (eval (e3, x, y))))))
  | _ -> failwith "error";;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Sqrt of expr
  | Abs of expr
  | Logistic of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildLogistic (e1,e2,e3) = Logistic (e1, e2, e3);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildSqrt e = Sqrt e;;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  match depth with
  | 0 -> (match rand (0, 2) with | 0 -> VarX | 1 -> VarY | _ -> VarY)
  | _ ->
      let next = build (rand, (depth - 1)) in
      (match rand (1, 8) with
       | 1 -> buildSine next
       | 2 -> buildCosine next
       | 3 ->
           buildAverage
             ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 4 -> buildTimes (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 5 ->
           buildThresh
             (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
               (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 6 -> buildSqrt next
       | 7 ->
           buildLogistic
             (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e' -> Printf.sprintf "sin(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Cosine e' -> Printf.sprintf "cos(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "((%s+%s)/2)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "%s*%s" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      Printf.sprintf "(%s<%s?%s:%s)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
        (exprToString e3) (exprToString e4)
  | Sqrt e -> Printf.sprintf "(%s)^0.5" (exprToString (Abs e))
  | Abs e -> Printf.sprintf "|%s|" (exprToString e)
  | Logistic (e1,e2,e3) ->
      Printf.sprintf "(1/(1 - e^(-%s*%s*%s)))" (exprToString e1)
        (exprToString e2) (exprToString e3)
  | _ -> failwith "are we writing a lisp compiler now";;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
match l with 
| (k', v') :: tl -> 
if k' = k then 
v' else 
assoc (d, k, tl)
| [] -> d
| _ -> failwith "This ain't your mom's hashmap"

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e' -> sin (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Cosine e' -> cos (pi *. (eval (e', x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Sqrt e -> sqrt (abs_float (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Logistic (e1,e2,e3) ->
      1.0 /.
        (1.0 -.
           (exp
              (-.
                 (((eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))) *.
                    (eval (e3, x, y))))))
  | _ -> failwith "error";;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Sqrt of expr
  | Abs of expr
  | Logistic of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildSqrt e = Sqrt e;;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  match depth with
  | 0 -> (match rand (0, 2) with | 0 -> VarX | 1 -> VarY | _ -> VarY)
  | _ ->
      let next = build (rand, (depth - 1)) in
      (match rand (1, 6) with
       | 1 -> buildSine next
       | 2 -> buildCosine next
       | 3 ->
           buildAverage
             ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 4 -> buildTimes (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 5 ->
           buildThresh
             (next, (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
               (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
       | 6 -> buildSqrt next);;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e' -> Printf.sprintf "sin(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Cosine e' -> Printf.sprintf "cos(pi*%s)" (exprToString e')
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "((%s+%s)/2)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      Printf.sprintf "%s*%s" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      Printf.sprintf "(%s<%s?%s:%s)" (exprToString e1) (exprToString e2)
        (exprToString e3) (exprToString e4)
  | Sqrt e -> Printf.sprintf "(%s)^0.5" (exprToString (Abs e))
  | Abs e -> Printf.sprintf "|%s|" (exprToString e)
  | Logistic (e1,e2,e3) ->
      Printf.sprintf "(1/(1 - e^(-%s*%s*%s)))" (exprToString e1)
        (exprToString e2) (exprToString e3)
  | _ -> failwith "are we writing a lisp compiler now";;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;
